meanings.definition: The state of being healthy and free from illness or injury.
meanings.sent1: Her doctor praised the healthfulnesses of her lifestyle choices.
meanings.sent2: The healthfulnesses of the food she ate helped her stay strong and fit.
meanings.sent3: The healthfulnesses of her immune system made the germs run away!
meanings.sent4: The healthfulnesses of her mind acted as a shield against negativity.
meanings.sent5: The healthfulnesses of her body shone through her glowing skin.

meanings.definition: The quality of promoting good health.
meanings.sent1: The healthfulnesses of the vitamins in the fruits were evident in her energy levels.
meanings.sent2: Regular exercise is essential for the healthfulnesses of the heart.
meanings.sent3: The healthfulnesses of the gym equipment made exercising more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: Laughter is like a dose of healthfulnesses for the soul.
meanings.sent5: The healthfulnesses of fresh air filled her lungs with vitality.
